activities.name: Visit to the Museo Nacional del Prado (Prado National Museum)
activities.short_description: See masterpieces by Goya, Velázquez, and El Greco. It's an essential stop in Madrid.

activities.name: Lunch near the Barrio de las Letras (Literary Quarter)
activities.short_description: Enjoy tapas and traditional Spanish food in a historic, literary setting.

activities.name: Explore Plaza Mayor and the San Miguel Market
activities.short_description: Walk through the main square, then sample Spanish delicacies at the famous food market.

activities.name: Exploration of the Royal Palace (Palacio Real) and Plaza de Oriente
activities.short_description: Tour the official residence of the Spanish monarchy and its adjacent grand square.

activities.name: Sunset View from the Temple of Debod (Templo de Debod)
activities.short_description: Watch the sunset from this ancient Egyptian temple relocated to Madrid.

activities.name: Dinner and Drinks in the La Latina Neighborhood
activities.short_description: Experience authentic Madrid nightlife and tapas culture in a lively area.

logistics_between_activities.additional_notes: A short walk from the Prado to the Barrio de las Letras for lunch.
Walk through the center to reach the historic Plaza Mayor.
A pleasant walk from Plaza Mayor to the Royal Palace area.
Walk through the gardens/parks towards the Temple of Debod for the sunset.
Take the metro or a 25-minute walk to La Latina for dinner.
